title: ecoevo.social guide

Rules to respect, etiquette and general things to know about the 
[ecoevo.social](https://ecoevo.social/) server or Mastodon in general.

[ecoevo.social](https://ecoevo.social/) is dedicated to the biological Ecology and Evolution community.
This is broadly defined so everyone connected to those topics closely or more remotely are welcome.

[ecoevo.social](https://ecoevo.social/) is administered by Alexis Simon.
This is volunteering work, and as such it may encounter some issues along the road.
Please be patient we are all learning here.

If you are in a position to do so, you can contribute financially for the maintenance of the server
through [Open Collective](https://opencollective.com/ecoevosocial).

Enjoy connecting!

## About privacy {.unnumbered}

A safe internet user is an informed internet user.

The [privacy policy](https://ecoevo.social/terms) indicate what will be enforced regarding privacy.

:::{.callout-warning}
## Important considerations about privacy

Posts on Mastodon are not end-to-end encrypted. Do not share any sensitive information over Mastodon.
For more details, see the [privacy policy](https://ecoevo.social/terms).

You must be aware that Mastodon data, both public and direct messages,
are accessible by server operators and receiving servers 
(for example if you send a direct message to someone on another server).

Quoted from the [privacy policy](https://ecoevo.social/terms):<br>
| We may also release your information when we believe release is appropriate to comply
| with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others rights, property, or safety.

If you require to have truly private conversations containing sensitive information with someone else,
we suggest you use another application offering end-to-end encryption and privacy. 
:::

## What is Mastodon? {.unnumbered}

Mastodon is a federated microblogging platform.

You can read more about it in its [documentation](https://docs.joinmastodon.org/).
